docs.snippet: Running back David Wilson will have surgery this month to repair a herniated disk in his neck, although it is expected that he will be recovered sufficiently to play next season, the team said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Running back David Wilson will have surgery this month to repair a herniated disk in his neck, although it is expected that he will be recovered sufficiently to play next season, the team said.
docs.abstract: NFL Roundup; New York Giants running back David Wilson will have surgery to repair a herniated disk in his neck; is expected to recover sufficiently to play in 2014.

headline.main: Giants’ David Wilson to Have Neck Surgery
headline.print_headline: Giants’ Wilson Set For Surgery On Neck

docs.snippet: With the losses of several players to injuries, and one to legal problems, the Patriots have focused on winning with the players they have available....

docs.abstract: New England Patriots started season without their five leading receivers from 2012; two signed with other teams, one left to shoot a movie, one was hurt and one was in jail; with other losses during season, team has focused on winning with players they had available.

docs.snippet: The world-famous football team has suffered the rare indignity of losing three games in a week in three different competitions.  "What has gone wrong at Man U?" is a talking point in offices across Britain and beyond and the team's poor form is pu...
docs.lead_paragraph: The world-famous football team has suffered the rare indignity of losing three games in a week in three different competitions.  "What has gone wrong at Man U?" is a talking point in offices across Britain and beyond and the team's poor form is putting pressure on its New York-listed shares.  Ivor Bennett reports.
